description: Justia CEO Tim Stanley enjoyed meeting with our friends at LII, CALI, and Rutgers at the recent CALIcon. Pictured clockwise from front center: Neli Karabelova (LII), Eric Gullufsen (LII), Linda Jackson (former American Opera Director), Tom Bruce (retired LII), John Joergensen (Rutgers), Elmer Masters (CALI), Craig Newton (LII), Tim Stanley (Justia), Nichole McCarthy (LII), Sara Frug (LII).
Zoey enjoys playing a good game of fetch! This is her favorite elephant toy which she's had since she was a small puppy.
